channel.title: Tricent Operational Status Status - Incident History

item.title: Scheduled maintenance work on app.tricent.com
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Scheduled Maintenance

Summary: Tricent will be performing maintenance on production servers to activate the latest security fixes and mitigations, potentially causing occasional outages for a few minutes. No action is required after the maintenance is completed.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 2, 09:00 - 12:00 CET

Feb 15, 16:05 CET
Scheduled - We at Tricent have of course a daily focus on IT security especially for our production systems. To activate the latest security fixes and mitigations we will do maintenance on our production servers.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the work.

When?
From Saturday 02-03-2024 at 09.00 and the following 3 hours - until 12.00.

What does this mean to you?
During this time occasional outages of a few minutes can occur.

Once the maintenance window has been completed, there is no need for action on your end – the solution will return to normal operation.

Questions?
If you have any questions regarding the above, you are more than welcome to contact Tricent Support.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance work on application infrastructure
item.content:encoded:
Jan 6, 11:10 CET
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 6, 11:07 CET
Verifying - Verification is currently underway for the maintenance items.

Jan 6, 11:06 CET
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 6, 10:00 CET
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 8, 08:56 CET
Scheduled - As part of our work to maintain and further improve our systems, we hereby schedule a maintenance window. This will allow us to improve the infrastructure of our application front end.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the work.

When?
From Saturday 6 January at 10:00 AM (CET) and the following 2 hours - until 12:00 AM.

What does this mean to you?
During this period, the application (app.tricent.com) might not be available or give you a certificate error in your browser. In the case of a certificate error, we advise you not to continue but wait until our maintenance work is over.

Once the maintenance work has been completed, there is no need for action on your end – the solution will return to normal operation.

Questions?
If you have any questions regarding the above, you are more than welcome to contact Tricent Support.

item.title: Access to Tricent for Microsoft 365 is currently unavailable
item.content:encoded:
Dec 12, 11:12 CET
Resolved - Access has now been restored, but we continue to monitor the system closely.

Once again we would like to apologize for any inconvenience caused by this incident.

If you have questions concerning the above, you are more than welcome to contact us at support@tricent.com or +45 7071 3131.

Best regards,
Tricent Support

Dec 12, 10:50 CET
Identified - Access to Tricent for Microsoft 365 is currently unavailable.

We are working to solve the issue and will return with an update no later than 12:00 PM (CET) today.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Best regards,
Tricent Support

item.title: Scheduled maintenance work on our main production database
item.content:encoded:
Aug 26, 17:00 CEST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Aug 26, 09:00 CEST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 18, 01:57 CEST
Scheduled - As part of our work to maintain and further improve our systems, we hereby schedule a maintenance window. The window will allow us to work on our main production database to provide better performance and less downtime during future updates.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the work.

When?
From Saturday 26 August at 09:00 AM (CEST) and the following 8 hours - until 5:00 PM.

What does this mean to you?
During the maintenance work, the application will be unavailable.

Once the maintenance window has been completed, there is no need for action on your end – the solution will return to normal (but improved) operation.

Questions?
If you have any questions regarding the above, you are more than welcome to contact Tricent Support.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance work on core database backend
item.content:encoded:
Feb 6, 00:00 CET
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 12, 00:00 CET
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 10, 14:27 CET
Scheduled - As part of our work to further improve our systems, we hereby schedule a maintenance window. The window will allow us to replace the core database backend, which handles the bulk of the Tricent for Microsoft 365 service.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the work.

When?
From Thursday, 12 January at 00:00 until Sunday, 5 February at 24:00.

What does this mean to you?
During the maintenance window, you will not have access to Tricent for Microsoft 365, and no cleanup of shares will be carried out.

Questions?
If you have any questions regarding the above, you are more than welcome to contact Tricent Support at support@tricent.com.

Jul 25, 12:56 CEST
Scheduled - As part of our work to maintain and further improve our systems, we hereby schedule a maintenance window. The window is requested by our 3rd party service provider and will impact our central databases.

During the maintenance slot our systems might not be available, mainly visible to the end user as not being able to login into https://app.tricent.com/

We apologise for any inconveniences caused by the work.

When?
From Sunday 28 August 2022 at 13:00 CEST and the following 1 hour.

Once the maintenance window has been completed, there is no need for action on your end – the solution will return to normal operation.

Questions?
If you have any question regarding the above, you are more than welcome to contact Tricent Support.
